fields.description:
Currently there is no mechanism to detect if the Websocket client is borked. This can be accomplished using a ping/pong heartbeat.

Clients opt-in by setting the {{x-heartbeat}} HTTP header. When set, the {{WebsocketSession}} will send a {{"ping"}} event every 30 seconds to the client. The client has 5 seconds to respond with a {{"pong"}}, otherwise the connection is closed by the server.
